info.name: Outlook Integrator
info.summary: Integration between Microsoft Outlook and Nextcloud Talk/Calendar
info.description:
This app provides a REST API for integrating Microsoft Outlook with Nextcloud Talk and Calendar.
Features: - Create Nextcloud Talk rooms from Outlook appointments - Synchronize calendar events between Outlook and Nextcloud - Advanced participant settings (authentication levels, secure email, notifications) - OAuth2 authentication support - CORS support for web-based Outlook add-ins
This app is designed to work with the Outlook Add-in for Nextcloud Talk.
info.author: ITSL
